name: Penny Drop
description:
Your piggy bank has a mind of its own, and has concocted a mischievous plan to test a widely circulated myth, that of a penny thrown from the top of a skyscraper. Your impressionable mind is coerced into carrying out this experiment.

You prepare yourself for the ultimate test by honing your penny dropping skills on a variety of unsuspecting targets, in a number of challenging environments. Forget about what you have seen on TV, for these are no ordinary pennies.
